GREETING.CEO_NAME: Accumulation of 10 years of clinical (plastic, beauty industry) experience in the medical device and aesthetic beauty industry Through the development of the medical device business, we are focusing on human health promotion projects in the 21st century.
GREETING.CONTENT_1: According to iData, a medical market researcher, Europe and the United States account for the largest share of the global dental implant market. Europe accounts for 34.3% of the total implant value and the United States 29.5% each year, with these two regions accounting for about 64% of the total market.
GREETING.CONTENT_2: Asia-Pacific, the world's top market in the future, is the third largest, accounting for 28.1% and South America 8.1%. The world's population is growing by 82 million people a year.
GREETING.CONTENT_3: In addition, the Asian beauty aesthetic and medical device market is rapidly growing in China and India. Based on its experience in the medical industry in India, the Middle East, and Africa, Roche BNH is focusing on expanding and exporting the market with the spearhead of K Medical, manufacturing, R&D, and education services, which are the core of the K bio business in Korea, through active marketing and technology development in the global network niche.
GREETING.CONTENT_4: Based on India's own clean room manufacturing facilities, executives and employees will complete a new business model for Korea and India at 1.4 billion won in India to lead to continuous and rapid K Medical spearhead.
GREETING.CONTENT_5: In addition, it will be a frontier for the job creation and high-value-added medical industry in the 21st century medical industry in Korea and India.
GREETING.VISION_POINT_1:
LocheBNH aims to realize the following vision by 2030: 

 Become a Global Leader in K-Medical
 Leveraging Korea’s advanced bio and medical device technologies, we will provide tailored solutions to emerging markets such as India, the Middle East, and Africa, positioning ourselves as a key partner in the global healthcare industry.
GREETING.VISION_POINT_2:
Strategic Expansion in Asia-Pacific
 With rapid population growth and increasing demand, we will focus on the booming beauty and medical device markets in China, India, and Southeast Asia through targeted technology development and marketing.
GREETING.VISION_POINT_3:
Complete the Triangle of Manufacturing, R&D, and Education
 Based on our cleanroom manufacturing facilities in India, we will build an integrated K-Medical platform encompassing product development, research, and professional training.
GREETING.VISION_POINT_4:
Create Jobs and Lead High-Value Medical Innovation
 Through Korea–India cooperation, we will foster a sustainable employment ecosystem and become a frontier in the 21st-century medical industry.
GREETING.VISION_INTRO: LocheBNH aims to realize the following vision by 2030:
GREETING.BECOME_A_GLOBAL_LEADER_IN_K_MEDICAL: Become a Global Leader in K-Medical
GREETING.BECOME_POINT_1: Leveraging Korea’s advanced bio and medical device technologies, we will provide tailored solutions to emerging markets such as India, the Middle East, and Africa, positioning ourselves as a key partner in the global healthcare industry.
GREETING.BECOME_POINT_1_DESC: Leveraging Korea’s advanced bio and medical device technologies, we will provide tailored solutions to emerging markets such as India, the Middle East, and Africa, positioning ourselves as a key partner in the global healthcare industry.
GREETING.BECOME_POINT_2_DESC: By establishing a strong presence in the Asia-Pacific region, particularly in India, we plan to capitalize on the region's growing healthcare demands. We will collaborate with local medical institutions and distributors to ensure our products and services effectively meet market needs.
GREETING.BECOME_POINT_3: Complete the Triangle of Manufacturing, R&D, and Education
GREETING.BECOME_POINT_3_DESC: Based on our cleanroom manufacturing facilities in India, we will build an integrated K-Medical platform encompassing product development, research, and professional training.
GREETING.BECOME_POINT_4: Create Jobs and Lead High-Value Medical Innovation
GREETING.BECOME_POINT_4_DESC: Through Korea–India cooperation, we will foster a sustainable employment ecosystem and become a frontier in the 21st-century medical industry.

LOCHE_NEWS.PRESS_TITLE: Loche Bio India Platform in Press Articles
LOCHE_NEWS.PRESS_SUBTITLE: Discover how Loche Bio is shaping India's K-Beauty landscape through partnerships and innovation.
LOCHE_NEWS.PRESS_1: Full-scale support for entry into the India Amazon Beauty category.
LOCHE_NEWS.PRESS_2: K-Beauty Enters India, with Packbox and Roche.
LOCHE_NEWS.PRESS_3: Packbox signs exclusive supply agreement with India’s K-beauty commerce platform.
LOCHE_NEWS.PRESS_4: K-Beauty enters India now with Bellaluna (www.bellaluna.in), a 100% invested K-startup.

SOCIAL.SUBTITLE: Building a healthier, more equitable, and sustainable future through K-Medical innovation.
SOCIAL.GLOBAL_HEALTH_EQUITY_DESCRIPTION: We are committed to improving access to quality medical devices and aesthetic solutions in underserved regions such as India, Africa, and the Middle East. Through cleanroom manufacturing and clinical expertise, we aim to reduce healthcare disparities and promote wellness for all.
SOCIAL.EDUCATION_WORKFORCE_DEVELOPMENT_DESCRIPT: Through K-Medical education programs, we empower local healthcare professionals with advanced training and certifications. We foster job creation and build sustainable employment ecosystems in Korea and partner nations.
SOCIAL.SUSTAINABLE_INNOVATION_DESCRIPTION: LocheBNH integrates eco-conscious practices into every stage of product design and manufacturing. Our goal is to minimize environmental impact while driving high-value medical innovation for a healthier planet.
SOCIAL.COMMUNITY_ENGAGEMENT_DESCRIPTION: We collaborate with governments, NGOs, and academic partners to advance public health, medical outreach, and aesthetic wellness education — building stronger, healthier communities worldwide.

COMPANY.DESCRIPTION: A journey of innovation and global medical excellence

TIMELINE_DATA.TITLE_2015: Entered the medical device and aesthetic beauty industry
TIMELINE_DATA.DESCRIPTION_2017: Based on 10 years of clinical data in plastic surgery and beauty.
TIMELINE_DATA.DESCRIPTION_2019: Entered Middle East and Africa; began building international networks.
TIMELINE_DATA.DESCRIPTION_2021: Collaborated in India’s medical sector and conducted local research.
TIMELINE_DATA.DESCRIPTION_2026: Completed cleanroom facility in India; began K-Medical product production.
TIMELINE_DATA.DESCRIPTION_2027: Introduced K-Bio training programs and expanded R&D center operations.
TIMELINE_DATA.DESCRIPTION_2028: Actively expanding exports across Asia and Africa under Vision 2030 initiative.

INQUIRY.INQUIRY_TITLE: Join LOCHE BIO with our expertise in the beauty industry and global network
INQUIRY.INQUIRY_DESCRIPTION: If you have any questions about manufacturing, production, branding, logistics, distribution, or sales related to beauty products, please contact us. Your inquiry will be answered promptly by our representatives via email, text message, or phone.
INQUIRY.SUBTITLE: Please fill out the form below to inquire about affiliate opportunities with PDRN USA. Our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
